{{{
SET @OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS=@@UNIQUE_CHECKS, UNIQUE_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@@FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS, FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_SQL_MODE=@@SQL_MODE, SQL_MODE='TRADITIONAL';

CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `clickremindme` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;
USE `clickremindme` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `clickremindme`.`item_props`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE  TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `clickremindme`.`item_props` (
  `prop_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL ,
  `prop_value` VARCHAR(45) NULL ,
  `item_id` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL )
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `clickremindme`.`sessions`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE  TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `clickremindme`.`sessions` (
  `session_id` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL ,
  `user_id` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL ,
  `last_activity` DATETIME NOT NULL ,
  PRIMARY KEY (`session_id`, `user_id`) )
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `clickremindme`.`items`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE  TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `clickremindme`.`items` (
  `item_id` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,
  `user_id` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL ,
  `sort_int` INT UNSIGNED NULL ,
  PRIMARY KEY (`item_id`) )
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `clickremindme`.`users`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE  TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `clickremindme`.`users` (
  `user_id` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,
  `username` VARCHAR(45) NULL ,
  `email` VARCHAR(45) NULL ,
  `password_md5` VARCHAR(32) NULL ,
  PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`) ,
  UNIQUE INDEX `username_UNIQUE` (`username` ASC) ,
  UNIQUE INDEX `email_UNIQUE` (`email` ASC) )
ENGINE = InnoDB;



SET SQL_MODE=@OLD_SQL_MODE;
